title: raising hands: light skin tone

The manus is the zoological term for the distal portion of the fore limb of an animal.

description: This version of the  Raising Hands emoji has the  Light Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Pale Skin Tone on supported platforms
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the raising hands emoji with a light skin tone radiates pure joy and exuberant celebration, with both hands lifted high in a gesture of triumph or excitement. Apple's signature 3D shading and soft, rounded edges give the figures a lively and dynamic feel, as if caught mid-cheer. This emoji is a powerful visual cue for expressing happiness, success, or enthusiastic agreement, adding an energetic and positive flourish to conversations on Apple devices.
